name: Oldy but Goldy Custard
description:
Get to know one of my ADVs: ( A SMAL KREEDS CUSTARD TWEAK !!! ) :-)
- Is easy to tweak.

- I prefer The Vanilla Ice Cream from LB, because is the richest of all for me. ( You can also Use the VBIC from TPA or CAP )

- Result in a very nice light milky, creamy Vanilla Custard Flavour with hint of  cake. 

- Not to sweet, but sweet enough!

- Steeping: 2-4 Weeks. Depending on your patience. 
  Get richer with time. A great Custard!

#Update 29.05.2018:
Changed the Icream from LB to TPA, to get more Vanilla from it.
author: Zugmaschine
